subject: procmail and clamav
body:
Has anyone figured out how to have fetchmail use procmail and have 
procmail use clamav to weed out all the malware yet?  I like 
spamassassin's work but am wondering if any other bayesian filters might 
be a bit less complex to set up?  If I could find one of those, it might 
be worth tossing the malware where the spam filter could train and then 
toss the malware.
